description: React Native Network Info API for iOS & Android

ios.sim.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/NetInfoExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme NetInfoExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Debug -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project example/ios/NetInfoExample.xcodeproj -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone X' -scheme NetInfoExample -parallelizeTargets -configuration Release -derivedDataPath example/ios/build  -UseModernBuildSystem=YES | xcpretty -k
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone X

android.emu.debug.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && popd
android.emu.debug.name: TestingAVD

android.emu.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && pushd example/android && ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release && popd
android.emu.release.name: TestingAVD

name: @react-native-community/netinfo

scripts.test: yarn validate:eslint && yarn validate:flow && yarn validate:typescript && yarn test:jest
scripts.test:detox:android:bundle:release: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform android --dev false --entry-file example/index.js --bundle-output .tmp/android-bundle.js
scripts.test:detox:clean: rimraf example/android/build && rimraf example/android/app/build && rimraf example/android/.gradle && rimraf example/ios/build
scripts.test:detox:ios:bundle:release: mkdir -p .tmp && react-native bundle --max-workers 4 --platform ios --dev false --entry-file example/index.js --bundle-output .tmp/ios-bundle.js
